name: Beef Stuffed Zucchini
author: CPCHKC
summary: Did your garden over-produce zucchini? Here is a great recipe to use up the zucchini and not get bored.
ingredients: 1 cup shredded Italian cheese blend, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Scoop seeds and flesh from zucchini halves with spoon, leaving hollowed-out shells
Put remaining flesh in a large bowl
Mix ground beef, tomato soup, water, bell pepper, bread crumbs, egg, Italian seasoning, and garlic powder with the zucchini flesh; spoon into the zucchini shells
Arrange stuffed zucchini onto the prepared baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes
Sprinkle Italian cheese blend over the zucchinis and continue baking until the cheese is melted and bubbly, about 10 minutes more
